name: The Teller
description:
The Teller

Become The Teller. Hold the world's fate in your hands as you balance the peculiar demands of your clients and the dangers of considering the profound whispers of an even stranger set of cards.

Play as the titular Teller, an oracle who channels higher beings through sentient soothsaying cards in order to make a barely sustainable living. Converse with the divine and decide how much of their prophecy humanity can endure as each rapidly splinters your mind.

Uncover the future by interrogating an omniscient yet elusive deck of cards, win at conversations, and try not to get crushed by the overwhelming responsibility of being the bearer of news. Will you dredge up secrets best left untold? Or ignore the cards and cling on to your final shards of sanity?

Features
  • A Choices Matter, part Visual Novel, part Point and Click experience.
  • Speak to an eccentric cast of fantasy characters: know them better than they know themselves! Each has contrasting afflictions and backgrounds but not all are as cooperative as the last.
  • The cards talk to you. Seek their knowledge. Every diverging choice, every undoing, they know it, viscerally.
  • Multiple endings: see what becomes of the world that knows its future.
  • A game that reacts to your choices: witness your fracturing psyche transform the screen!
  • 1-2 hours of your life and too many of ours!
Controls

Left mouse click - All interactions

ESC - Hold to skip text
